meanings.definition: A compound containing the methoxide ion.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different methoxides in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use methoxides in various chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The methoxides in the experiment decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: The methoxides danced together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue color of the methoxides caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The anion CH3O-, derived from methanol.
meanings.sent1: Methoxides are important in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent2: The methoxides reacted with the other compounds in the solution.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous methoxides played a prank on the chemist.
meanings.sent4: The methoxides whispered secrets to each other in the beaker.
meanings.sent5: The sweet smell of the methoxides filled the laboratory.
